titleStmt.title: The remonstrance of the kingdome of England to the Universities of Oxford and Cambridge. With a review of the Covenant. By way of qu√¶re. In satisfaction to all those who desire thorow information of the danger thereof.

notesStmt.note: Urging the Universities to declare themselves opposed to the Solemn League and Covenant. Cf. Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
